title: barrier
description: Evaluate boolean predicates at runtime to prevent optimizer reordering or pushdown.
kernels:
  - returns: boolean
    args:
    - name: expression
      type: string
    - name: col_name
      type: string
    - name: col_value
      type: any
---

## Description

Evaluates a boolean expression using runtime values. Additional column name and value pairs can be provided to bind variables used in the expression.

## Examples

```sql
SELECT *
FROM orders
WHERE barrier('amount > 100 AND status = "active"',
             'amount', amount,
             'status', status);
```
